segment.source: Manage settings for the Windows Store for Business (Windows 10)
segment.target: Manage settings for the Windows Store for Business (Windows 10)

segment.source: You can add users and groups, as well as update some of the settings associated with the Azure Active Directory (AD) tenant.
segment.target: You can add users and groups, as well as update some of the settings associated with the Azure Active Directory (AD) tenant.

segment.source: Manage settings for the Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Manage settings for the Windows Store for Business

segment.source: You can add users and groups, as well as update some of the settings associated with the Azure Active Directory (AD) tenant
segment.target: You can add users and groups, as well as update some of the settings associated with the Azure Active Directory (AD) tenant

segment.source: Update Windows Store for Business account settings
segment.target: Update Windows Store for Business account settings

segment.source: The Account information page in Windows Store for Business shows information about your organization that you can update, including: country or region, organization name, default domain, and language preference.
segment.target: The Account information page in Windows Store for Business shows information about your organization that you can update, including: country or region, organization name, default domain, and language preference.

segment.source: These are settings in the Azure AD directory that you used when signing up for Store for Business
segment.target: These are settings in the Azure AD directory that you used when signing up for Store for Business

segment.source: Manage user accounts in Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Manage user accounts in Windows Store for Business

segment.source: Store for Business manages permissions with a set of roles.
segment.target: Store for Business manages permissions with a set of roles.

segment.source: Currently, you can assign these roles to individuals in your organization, but not to groups.
segment.target: Currently, you can assign these roles to individuals in your organization, but not to groups.
